scripts.makemigrations: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py makemigrations'
scripts.migrate: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py migrate'
scripts.createsuperuser: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py createsuperuser'
scripts.import-sample-data: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py loaddata sample.yaml'
